department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: The objectives of this course are to introduce the development of the field of Computer Assisted Language Learning, to discuss the design principle of Computer Assisted Language Learning, and to implement a Computer Assisted Language Learning system.
goal.ch: 本課程的目標主要包含: 了解智慧型語言學習系統研究領域的發展, 探討智慧型語言學習系統的相關設計原則, 並實際開發一個智慧型語言學習系統.

content.en: The course includes: Lecture, Group discussion, and Group presentations (group project proposal, system exploration, group project final presentations).
content.ch: 本課程授課方式包含: 講課, 小組討論, 小組簡報(期末專題提案, 系統分析, 及期末系統展示)等.

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導 其他

grading.en: Group discussion (every week): 20％ Group project proposal presentation: 15％ System exploration presentation: 15％ Group project final presentation: 30％ Peer evaluation: 10％ Attendance: 10％
